episodes.title: It Came from the Nightosphere
episodes.plot: Finn summons the Lord of Evil to reconcile with his daughter, Marceline the Vampire Queen, but ends up unleashing him of the unsuspecting land.

episodes.title: The Eyes
episodes.plot: Because of a creepy horse outside their window, Finn and Jake cannot get any sleep.

episodes.title: Loyalty to the King
episodes.plot: After shaving, the Ice King is mistaken as a good guy and takes advantage of the situation.

episodes.title: Blood Under the Skin
episodes.plot: Finn is made fun of by a group of knights and reacts by questing for a set of magical armor that will earn him respect.

episodes.title: Storytelling
episodes.plot: Unable to give a sick Jake an entertaining story, Finn sets off into the woods to discover a true story.

episodes.title: Slow Love
episodes.plot: Finn and Jake try to find a girlfriend for a giant snail so that it will stop wrecking their tree-house.

episodes.title: Power Animal
episodes.plot: Finn is kidnapped, but Jake's short attention span means rescue is dubious.

episodes.title: Crystals Have Power
episodes.plot: Jake swears a life of non-violence right before a race of indestructible crystal-men abduct Finn to another dimension.

episodes.title: The Other Tarts
episodes.plot: Finn and Jake are given one of the highest responsibilities: transporting and guarding the rarest pastry in the Candy Kingdom.

episodes.title: To Cut a Woman's Hair
episodes.plot: An evil witch threatens to crush Jake to death if Finn doesn't deliver her the hair of a princess.

episodes.title: The Chamber of Frozen Blades
episodes.plot: While he's away, Finn and Jake sneak into Ice King's fortress.

episodes.title: Her Parents
episodes.plot: Anxious about meeting Lady Rainicorn's parents, Jake tries to pass himself off as a Rainicorn.

episodes.title: The Pods
episodes.plot: Given the duty of protecting three magic beans, one evil and two good, Finn and Jake decide to plant them to find out which is which.

episodes.title: The Silent King
episodes.plot: After defeating their king, Finn becomes the new ruler of the Goblin people, and finds that their strange ways are too difficult to understand.

episodes.title: The Real You
episodes.plot: Nervous about giving a speech at Princess Bubblegum's science conference and barbecue, Finn finds a magical pair of glasses that make him the smartest being in the land.

episodes.title: Guardians of Sunshine
episodes.plot: Finn and Jake become trapped inside one of BMO's video game creations.

episodes.title: Death in Bloom
episodes.plot: After accidentally killing Princess Bubblegum's beloved plant, Finn and Jake travel to the land of the dead to bring it back to life.

episodes.title: Susan Strong
episodes.plot: Having always believed he is the only human left in the Land of Ooo, Finn believes he has discovered a tribe to primitive humans living underground.

episodes.title: Mystery Train
episodes.plot: While traveling on a train, Finn and Jake find themselves in the middle of a murder mystery.

episodes.title: Go with Me
episodes.plot: Jake and Marceline give Finn conflicting advise on how to ask out Princess Bubblegum.

episodes.title: Belly of the Beast
episodes.plot: Finn and Jake must save a group of clueless, party-minded teddy bears living inside the belly of a monster.

episodes.title: The Limit
episodes.plot: An enormous maze tests the limit of Jake's stretching power.

episodes.title: Video Makers
episodes.plot: Finn and Jake set out to make their own movie, but have conflicting visions of what their movie should be.

episodes.title: Mortal Folly
episodes.plot: The Lich, the greatest form of pure evil in the land of Ooo, is accidentally unleashed. With the highest stakes, Finn and Jake set out on the most serious adventure of their career.

episodes.title: Mortal Recoil
episodes.plot: With the evil Lich seemingly defeated, Finn and Jake are uneasy with their success because of its great cost.

episodes.title: Heat Signature
episodes.plot: Finn and Jake ask Marceline the Vampire Queen to turn them into vampires. However, she isn't interested in transforming her friends and tricks them into thinking she has.
